Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-2295.13.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 1102(d) of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).

For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 1202 of Fiscal Year 2002 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-124, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7861).

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-144, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1219.01.

For Law 13-38, see notes following § 2-1205.01.

For Law 14-28, see notes following § 2-301.05(a).

For Law 17-138, see notes following § 2-1219.01.
